metadata.title: CVE-2018-8798 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Readin function rdpsnd_process_ping() that results in an information leak.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rdesktop - 1.8.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
